page.title: 15LOCH CUL FRAIOCH
page.content: It's a perfect day for fishing at {Loch Cul Fraioch,}breezy , dry and bright. Kenny and I had arranged to meet my friend Robbie and his dad Robert at 11 o' clock at the bottom of the{Culkein}peat road. We went out on the{Angling Club boat. We took two rods each and a pack lunch to eat later. Kenny took the worms and hooks. We started fishing and soon the grown ups had caught some large trout. A minute or two later I had a strong bite. I could not pull it out by myself so Robbie gave me a hand. What luck! A good sized trout. After our lunch we carried on fishing but no luck for Robbie. The weather had changed, very calm, and out came the midgies in their hundreds. Home we went to a tasty supper!
